memberdef.name: CUDA_GUARD
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const cudaError_t _st = (expr); \ if (_st != cudaSuccess) { \ ie_cuda_record_cuda_error(_st); \ return -1; \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Cached device buffer used by ie_cuda_touch_bytes().
Cached device accumulator used by ie_cuda_touch_bytes().
Set the last error string directly (C ABI).

detaileddescription.para: This is intended for other CUDA translation units to report errors without defining their own ie_cuda_last_error_string symbol.

briefdescription.para: Clear the last error string (C ABI).
Record a CUDA error into the shared global error string.

memberdef.argsstring: (float *y, const T *w, const float *x, int rows, int cols)

briefdescription.para: Launch row-wise GEMV for INT8 weights and INT8 input.
Unpack a signed 4-bit integer from a packed byte.

parameterdescription.para: Packed byte containing two int4 values.
If nonzero, use high nibble; else low nibble.

memberdef.argsstring: (float *y, const uint8_t *w_packed, const int8_t *x, int rows, int cols, float w_scale, float x_scale)
memberdef.name: gemv_rowwise_int4_kernel

briefdescription.para: Row-wise GEMV kernel for INT4 packed weights and INT8 input.

detaileddescription.para: Weights are packed: two int4 values per byte (low/high nibble).

memberdef.name: ie_cuda_touch_kernel

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel that touches a buffer with a given stride.

detaileddescription.para: Each thread reads bytes spaced by stride_bytes and accumulates into a global counter to prevent the compiler from optimizing the loads away.

memberdef.argsstring: (const void *seed, size_t seed_len, size_t bytes_per_token, size_t stride_bytes, uint64_t tokens, int verify_touch)
memberdef.name: ie_cuda_touch_bytes

briefdescription.para: Touch a given number of bytes per token on the GPU to ensure real CUDA activity.

detaileddescription.para: This is used by the strict benchmark harness to prevent "fake GPU" reports where the runtime silently falls back to CPU or does no meaningful work.

parameterdescription.para: Optional host seed bytes to initialize the device buffer.
Number of bytes to touch per token.
If nonzero, copy back checksum and require it to be nonzero.
